TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompareValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator

summary.span: 将用户在输入控件中输入的值与在另一个输入控件中输入的值或与常量值进行比较。

span.span: Compares the value entered by the user in an input control with the value entered in another input control, or with a constant value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件将用户在输入控件（如控件）中输入的值 与在另一个输入控件中输入的值或常量值进行比较。Use the control to compare the value entered by the user in an input control, such as a control, with the value entered in another input control or a constant value. 如果输入控件的值与 、 和/或属性指定的条件相匹配，则控件将通过验证 。The control passes validation if the value of the input control matches the criteria specified by the , , and/or properties. 你还可以使用 控件来指示输入控件中输入的值是否可以转换为属性指定的数据类型 。You can also use the control to indicate whether the value entered in an input control can be converted to the data type specified by the property. 通过设置属性来指定要验证的输入控件 。Specify the input control to validate by setting the property. 如果要将特定的输入控件与其他输入控件进行比较，请设置 属性以指定要比较的控件。If you want to compare a specific input control with another input control, set the property to specify the control to compare with. > [!NOTE] > 如果在由属性指定的输入控件中输入的值 无法转换为属性所指定的数据类型 ，但可以转换由属性指定的输入控件中输入的值 ，则被验证的输入控件将被视为有效。If the value entered in the input control specified by the property cannot be converted to the data type specified by the property, but the value entered in the input control specified by the property can be converted, the input control being validated is considered valid. 因此，您还应 在由属性指定的输入控件上放置一个或控件 。Therefore, you should also place a or control on the input control specified by the property. 可以将输入控件的值与常量值进行比较，而不是将输入控件的值与其他输入控件进行比较。Instead of comparing the value of an input control with another input control, you can compare the value of an input control to a constant value. 通过设置属性来指定要比较的常量值 。Specify the constant value to compare with by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果由属性指定的值 无法转换为属性指定的数据类型 ，则会引发异常。If the value specified by the property cannot be converted to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. 在以编程方式将值分配给属性之前，请务必检查值的数据类型 。Be sure to check the data type of a value before programmatically assigning it to the property. > [!NOTE] > 不要同时设置 和 属性。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 可以将输入控件的值与其他输入控件或常量值进行比较。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果同时设置了这两个属性，则 属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 使用 属性指定要执行的比较的类型，例如 "大于"、"等于" 等。Use the property to specify the type of comparison to perform, such as greater than, equal to, and so on. 如果将属性设置 为 `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck` ，则该 控件将忽略 和 属性，并只指示输入控件中输入的值是否可以转换为属性指定的数据类型 。If you set the property to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, the control ignores the and properties and simply indicates whether the value entered in the input control can be converted to the data type specified by the property. 属性用于指定两个比较值的数据类型。The property is used to specify the data type of both comparison values. 执行比较操作之前，这两个值都将自动转换为此数据类型。Both values are automatically converted to this data type before the comparison operation is performed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果将 属性设置为 ，并且当前日历类型为非公历，则验证程序将仅执行服务器端验证。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 验证程序客户端脚本仅支持公历日历。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 下表列出了可以比较的各种数据类型。The following table lists the various data types that can be compared. |数据类型Data type|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|字符串数据类型。A string data type.| |`Integer`|32 位有符号整数数据类型。A 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|双精度浮点数字数据类型。A double-precision floating-point number data type.| |`Date`|日期数据类型。A date data type.| |`Currency`|Decimal 数据类型。A decimal data type. 它不能包含货币符号。It cannot contain currency symbols.| > [!NOTE] > 如果输入控件为空，则不会调用任何验证函数，验证将成功。If the input control is empty, no validation functions are called and validation succeeds. 使用 控件要求用户在输入控件中输入数据。Use a control to require the user to enter data in the input control. > [!NOTE] > 在 控件内使用控件时 ，请确保验证程序控件及其关联的控件位于同一面板中。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关将 控件用于部分页面更新的详细信息，请参阅 [部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). 有关验证控件的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about validation controls, see . ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件来比较两个控件中的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to compare the values in two controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数将所有字段初始化为其默认值。The parameterless constructor initializes any fields to their default values.

summary.span: 将此控件的属性添加到输出流中，以便在客户端上呈现。

span.span: Adds the attributes of this control to the output stream for rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便 错误消息始终显示为粗体。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the error message always appears in bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

returns.span: 如果控件属性有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control properties are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便它始终返回 visible 属性的值，前提 是该控件的属性 在页面上并且包含验证属性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns the value of the visible property, as long as the property of the control is on the page and contains validation properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ControlToCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ControlToCompare : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置将与正在被验证的输入控件进行比较的输入控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the input control to compare with the input control being validated.

value.span: 将与正在被验证的输入控件进行比较的输入控件。

span.span: The input control to compare with the input control being validated.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定输入控件（如 控件），以便与要验证的输入控件进行比较。Use the property to specify an input control, such as a control, to compare with the input control being validated. 如果此属性指定的输入控件不是页面上的控件，则会引发异常。If the input control specified by this property is not a control on the page, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 不要同时设置 和 属性。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 可以将输入控件的值与其他输入控件或常量值进行比较。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果同时设置了这两个属性，则 属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果要比较的控件是隐藏的或位于容器 (如 不可见的控件) ，则验证程序只执行服务器端验证。If the control to compare is hidden or is inside a container (such as a control) that is not visible, the validator performs server-side validation only. 验证程序客户端脚本仅支持可见控件。The validator client script supports only visible controls. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定要与要验证的控件进行比较的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the control to compare with the control being validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，此方法包含代码，以确定输入控件中的值是否有效。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this method contains the code to determine whether the value in the input control is valid.

returns.span: 如果输入控件中的值有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便在 `true` 两个指定控件的值相同时，它始终返回 `false` 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns `true` if the values of the two specified controls are the same and `false` otherwise. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator Operator { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要执行的比较操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the comparison operation to perform.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定要执行的比较操作。Use the property to specify the comparison operation to perform. 下表列出了可能的比较运算。The following table lists the comparison operations that are possible. |操作Operation|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Equal`|要验证的输入控件的值与另一个控件的值是否相等，或是否为常数值。A comparison for equality between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`NotEqual`|要验证的输入控件的值与另一个控件或常量值之间的不相等比较。A comparison for inequality between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`GreaterThan`|要验证的输入控件的值与另一个控件的值或常量值之间的比较。A comparison for greater than between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`GreaterThanEqual`|要验证的输入控件的值与另一个控件或常量值之间的大于或等于。A comparison for greater than or equal to between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`LessThan`|要验证的输入控件的值与另一个控件或常量值之间的小于的比较。A comparison for less than between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`LessThanEqual`|要验证的输入控件的值与另一个控件或常量值之间的小于或等于的比较。A comparison for less than or equal to between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`DataTypeCheck`|要验证的输入控件中输入的值与属性指定的数据类型之间的数据类型比较 。A data type comparison of the value entered in the input control being validated and the data type specified by the property. 如果无法将值转换为指定的数据类型，则验证失败。Validation fails if the value cannot be converted to the specified data type. **注意：** 使用此运算符时，将忽略和属性。**Note:** The and properties are ignored when this operator is used.| 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定比较运算。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the comparison operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的比较运算符不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified comparison operator is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValueToCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValueToCompare : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个常量值，用于与用户在正被验证的输入控件中输入的值进行比较。

span.span: Gets or sets a constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated.

value.span: 用于与用户在正被验证的输入控件中输入的值进行比较的常量值。

span.span: The constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定一个常数值，以便与用户在要验证的输入控件中输入的值进行比较。Use the property to specify a constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated. 如果此属性指定的常量值无法转换为属性指定的数据类型 ，则会引发异常。If the constant value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 不要同时设置 和 属性。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 可以将输入控件的值与其他输入控件或常量值进行比较。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果同时设置了这两个属性，则 属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性将用户在控件中输入的值 与常数值进行比较。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to compare the value entered by the user in a control with a constant value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
